amendment.description: To require a report on the use of defense access road funding to build alternate routes for military equipment traveling to missile launch facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4008 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4008 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Daines to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2966-2969; text: CR S2967) To require a report on the use of defense access road funding to build alternate routes for military equipment traveling to missile launch facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4008 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4008 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Daines to Amendment SA 3896.
